mapper.select:
SELECT BM.BM_NO, BM.BM_TITLE, BM.BM_WRITER, BM.BM_EMAIL, BM.BM_CONTENT, BM.BM_HIT, BM.BM_DATE, BM.BM_GROUP, BM.BM_POS, BM.BM_STEP, BM.BM_PW, NVL(BS.BS_FILE, '없음') BS_FILE FROM BOARD_MASTER_T BM, BOARD_SUB_T BS WHERE BM.BM_NO = BS.BM_NO(+)
AND BM.BM_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{cb_search}||'%'
AND BM.BM_NO = #{bm_no}
ORDER BY BM.BM_GROUP DESC, BM.BM_STEP ASC
SELECT NVL ((SELECT /*+INDEX_DESC(BOARD_MASTER_T BOARD_MNO_PK)*/ BM_NO FROM BOARD_MASTER_T WHERE ROWNUM = 1) ,0) + 1 BM_NO FROM DUAL
SELECT NVL ((SELECT /*+INDEX_DESC(BOARD_MASTER_T I_GROUP)*/ BM_GROUP FROM BOARD_MASTER_T WHERE ROWNUM = 1 AND BM_GROUP > 0) ,0) + 1 BM_GROUP FROM DUAL
SELECT NVL ( (SELECT /*+INDEX_DESC(BOARD_SUB_T BOARD_SUB_PK)*/ BS_SEQ FROM BOARD_SUB_T WHERE ROWNUM = 1 AND BS_SEQ > 0) ,0) + 1 BS_SEQ FROM DUAL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_MASTER_T (BM_NO, BM_TITLE, BM_WRITER, BM_DATE, BM_EMAIL, BM_CONTENT, BM_GROUP, BM_POS, BM_STEP, BM_PW) VALUES (#{bm_no}, #{bm_title}, #{bm_writer}, TO_CHAR (SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{bm_email}, #{bm_content}, #{bm_group}, #{bm_pos}, #{bm_step}, #{bm_pw})
INSERT INTO BOARD_SUB_T (BM_NO, BS_SEQ, BS_FILE) VALUES (#{bm_no}, #{bs_seq}, #{bs_file})
